name: QUADRATORUM (LD50)
description:
Best gameplay is when the music volume is cranked up. There have been some inconsistent effects when music volume is very low. Good luck! I highly recommend the shield.

If you are getting poor performance, make sure Hardware Acceleration is enabled in your browser settings, or try one of the standalone desktop builds 

Plot

Battle your way through hoards of enemies squares in order to delay the inevitable. Your own demise. Don't be afraid to take a little bit of damage, you're a circle after all!

Features

  • Three Rounds of Increasing Difficulty
  • Upgrades
  • Sound Synchronized Battle & Environment
  • An ending cutscene!
TeamRoleViktor (Blue Pin Studio)Programming / ArtBahskaMusic / SFX

This game was made over the course of 3 days working part-time.
